settings.heading: What are the key points I should focus on while promoting NPTA programs?
settings.row_content:
When promoting NPTA focus on these key points: 

  • Lowest price guarantee on all NASM courses. 
  • Offers NASM course price matching + Interest-free payment plan options.
  • Post-Certification Apprenticeship Program to gain hands-on experience and mentorship from Canada’s top trainers.

settings.heading: What are some tips and tricks I can use to promote NPTA as an affiliate?
settings.row_content:
Here’s a strategy guide to follow for developing click-worthy content with NPTA affiliate links:

  • Understand Your Audience - Know your followers' interests. Are they fitness enthusiasts, aspiring personal trainers, or looking for career advancement? 
  • Tailor Messaging - Craft messages that resonate with these interests, highlighting how certification can help them achieve their goals.
  • Showcase Personal Experience - Discuss your journey as a certified personal trainer. Share how the certification helped you and the benefits you’ve experienced. 
  • Success Stories - Highlight the success stories of others who have benefited from the certification. Use testimonials and case studies.
  • Create Valuable Content Educational Posts - Create posts about the importance of certification, the benefits of being a certified trainer, and how it can open up career opportunities. 
  • Workshops and Webinars - Host live or recorded workshops and webinars discussing the certification process, what to expect, and the advantages. 
  • Provide Exclusive Offers, Discount Codes - Offer exclusive discount codes or promotional offers for followers interested in enrolling in the certification program. 
  • Giveaways - Organize giveaways where followers can win discounts or free enrollment in the certification program. 
  • Highlight Career Benefits - Emphasize how certification can lead to job opportunities, higher earning potential, and professional credibility.
  • Networking - Discuss the networking opportunities and community support that come with certification.
